thread.title: BRIEF-Oaktree Strategic Income Qtrly ‍net Investment Income Of $4.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-Oaktree Strategic Income Qtrly ‍net Investment Income Of $4.5 Mln
text:
February 9, 2018 / 1:07 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Oaktree Strategic Income Qtrly ‍net Investment Income Of $4.5 Mln Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Oaktree Strategic Income Corporation : 
* OAKTREE STRATEGIC INCOME CORPORATION ANNOUNCES FIRST FISCAL QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS 
* OAKTREE STRATEGIC INCOME CORPORATION - QTRLY ‍NET INVESTMENT INCOME OF $4.5 MILLION, OR $0.15 PER SHARE​ 
* OAKTREE STRATEGIC INCOME CORPORATION - QTRLY ‍TOTAL INVESTMENT INCOME OF $10.7 MILLION, OR $0.36 PER SHARE​ 
* OAKTREE STRATEGIC INCOME CORPORATION - ‍NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 OF $9.84​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
